ground_truth: The POV moves from the Jack-O-Lantern down to another window and peers inside, where the boyfriend grabs the sister and kisses her. Into the bedroom comes the sister, 18, very pretty, as Alan, 18, wearing a Halloween mask and a costume, enters. She giggles as the boyfriend jumps into the room. The boyfriend rips off his mask, revealing a handsome young man underneath, and they kiss again with more passion as she responds to him. The POV swings away from the window, pacing restlessly and agitated, and then springs back from the window, quickly stalking down the side of the house, past the Jack-O-Lantern, to a door, which is quickly opened as the POV moves inside. The POV glides silently through the house into the kitchen, up to a drawer, which is opened, and a large butcher knife is withdrawn. The POV swings around and moves to the kitchen door, looking down a hallway to the front door. The boyfriend is seen stepping out of the bedroom door, buttoning his shirt. Slowly, the POV moves into the room, focusing on the discarded Halloween mask on the floor, bending down to pick it up, then suddenly covering the POV with the mask through the eye-holes. The POV moves slowly down the hall to the bedroom door, peering inside where the sister sits at her night-table brushing her hair, still completely nude. The POV moves up behind the sister, and sensing a presence, she spins around, staring at the POV and covering her breasts quickly. Suddenly, the POV lunges forward as the sister continues to stare incredulously, and there is a rapid blur as the POV drives the butcher knife into the sister's chest and out again almost before it's seen. In a wild paroxysm, the butcher knife blurs in and out of frame, slashing the sister mercilessly as she begins to scream, tries to fend off the blows with her hands, then suddenly falls out of frame to the floor. The POV moves back away from the sister's lifeless body, spins around, and careens out of the bedroom at top speed, racing through the darkened house to the front door, out the door, down the steps, and rapidly up the street. The camera careens along in frenzied flight, up the sidewalk, up a small side alley, down someone's backyard, then comes to a sudden, abrupt halt in front of Mother and Father just coming out of a neighbor's house. The father's hand reaches up and rips off the Halloween mask, revealing Michael, 6, underneath, a bright-eyed boy with a calm, quiet smile on his face.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: The POV shifts from the Jack-O-Lantern to another window, where the boyfriend kisses the sister. The sister, 18 and pretty, enters the bedroom as Alan, also 18, wearing a Halloween mask and costume, joins her. She giggles as the boyfriend jumps in, removes his mask, revealing a handsome face, and they kiss passionately. The POV moves away, agitated, then returns, stalking down the house side, past the Jack-O-Lantern, to a door, entering silently. It glides through the house to the kitchen, opens a drawer, and takes a large butcher knife. The POV turns to the kitchen door, sees the boyfriend leaving the bedroom, buttoning his shirt. Slowly, it enters the room, focuses on a discarded Halloween mask, picks it up, and covers the POV with it. The POV moves down the hall to the bedroom, where the sister sits brushing her hair, nude. Sensing a presence, she turns, covering herself. Suddenly, the POV lunges, stabbing her chest with the knife. The knife blurs in and out, slashing her as she screams and falls. The POV retreats from her body, races through the house, out the door, and up the street. It stops abruptly in front of Mother and Father exiting a neighbor's house. The father removes the mask, revealing Michael, 6, a bright-eyed boy with a calm smile.

It peers inquisitively inside, where it observes the boyfriend reaching out with an affectionate gesture to grab the sister and unceremoniously planting a kiss on her lips. Into the bedroom enters the sister, a young woman who is 18 years old and notably very pretty, as Alan, who is also 18, makes his entrance while wearing a Halloween mask and a costume. She emits a cheerful giggle as the boyfriend energetically leaps into the room. The boyfriend then dramatically rips off his mask, unveiling a handsome young man beneath it, and they share another kiss, this time with even more fervent energy, as she responds warmly and lovingly to him. The POV swings away from the window with a restless, agitated motion, before it suddenly springs back away from the window, quickly stalking down the side of the house, passing the Jack-O-Lantern, to a door, which is swiftly opened as the POV glides inside. The POV swings around with deliberate intent and moves toward the kitchen door, looking down a hallway that stretches toward the front door. The boyfriend appears, stepping out of the bedroom, casually buttoning his shirt. Slowly and deliberately, the POV progresses into the room, focusing intently on the discarded Halloween mask lying carelessly on the floor, bending down to pick it up, then abruptly covering the POV with the mask by looking through the eye-holes. The POV advances slowly down the hallway straight to the bedroom door, peering inside where the sister is seated at her night-table, brushing her hair, still completely nude. The POV approaches from behind the sister, and as she senses a presence, she spins around, staring directly at the POV, quickly covering her breasts in alarm. Suddenly, the POV lunges forward as the sister continues to stare incredulously, and there is a rapid blur as the POV drives the butcher knife into the sister's chest and withdraws it almost instantaneously. In a wild, frenzied paroxysm, the butcher knife flashes in and out of frame, slashing the sister mercilessly as she begins to scream, tries desperately to fend off the brutal blows with her hands, then suddenly collapses out of frame, falling to the floor. The POV retreats, moving back away from the sister's now lifeless body, spins around, and careens out of the bedroom at top speed, racing frantically through the darkened house toward the front door, bursting out the door, down the steps, and rapidly up the street. The camera moves in a chaotic, frenzied flight, up the sidewalk, into a small side alley, down someone's backyard, then comes to a sudden, abrupt halt directly in front of Mother and Father, who are just coming out of a neighbor's house. The father's hand reaches up and tears off the Halloween mask, revealing Michael, a 6-year-old boy underneath, a bright-eyed child with a calm, quiet smile on his face.

test_cases.description: The viewpoint shifts from the sunflower to another chimney and glances inside, where the chef hugs the parrot and whispers to it. Into the library strolls the parrot, 18, extremely colorful, as Brenda, 18, wearing a party hat and a uniform, appears. She chuckles as the chef dances into the chamber. The chef tears off his hat, exposing a curly-haired young woman beneath, and they whisper again with more fervor as she reacts to them. The viewpoint swings away from the chimney, pacing anxiously and troubled, and then leaps back from the chimney, swiftly marching down the side of the palace, past the sunflower, to a portal, which is quickly pushed as the viewpoint enters inside. The viewpoint floats quietly through the palace into the ballroom, up to a cupboard, which is pushed open, and a large feather duster is extracted. The viewpoint spins around and moves to the ballroom portal, gazing down a corridor to the main gate. The chef is spotted sliding out of the library portal, zipping his jacket. Gradually, the viewpoint glides into the chamber, focusing on the scattered party hat on the rug, stooping down to scoop it up, then abruptly placing the viewpoint with the hat through the eye-holes. The viewpoint drifts slowly down the corridor to the library portal, peering inside where the parrot perches at its vanity grooming its feathers, still completely preened. The viewpoint approaches behind the parrot, and sensing a shadow, it swivels around, gazing at the viewpoint and fluffing its wings promptly. Abruptly, the viewpoint lunges forward as the parrot continues to gaze incredulously, and there is a swift haze as the viewpoint drives the feather duster into the parrot's cage and out again almost before it's noticed. In a frenzied tumult, the feather duster blurs in and out of view, dusting the parrot tirelessly as it begins to squawk, attempts to fend off the strokes with its talons, then all of a sudden drops out of view to the ground. The viewpoint edges away from the parrot's motionless form, twirls around, and rushes out of the library at full speed, sprinting through the dimmed palace to the main gate, out the gate, down the steps, and swiftly up the boulevard. The camera bounces along in panicked retreat, up the pathway, up a tiny lane, down someone's orchard, then halts suddenly, abruptly stopping in front of the Gardener and the Sailor just emerging from a neighbor's cottage. The sailor's hand reaches up and tears off the party hat, unveiling Jamie, 6, beneath, a bright-eyed child with a serene, gentle grin on their face.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: The POV shifts from a Jack-O-Lantern to a window, where a boyfriend, Alan, kisses his girlfriend. As he removes his mask, revealing a handsome face, the POV becomes restless and moves around the house. It enters the kitchen, procures a large butcher knife, and spots the boyfriend exiting a bedroom. The POV then dons the discarded Halloween mask and moves to the bedroom where the sister is brushing her hair. The POV suddenly attacks, stabbing the sister repeatedly until she falls to the floor. After the ruthless act, the POV races out of the house and through the neighborhood. It halts abruptly in front of Mother and Father exiting a neighbor's house. The father removes the Halloween mask, revealing a calm 6-year-old Michael with a quiet smile.
